oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Offering nutrition and ration balancing as a service
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brennan, David T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dairy
nutrition
ration
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Offering nutrition and ration balancing services can be an excellent way to increase revenue at a veterinary practice, as well be a solution for the changing role of the consulting veterinarian. Todayâ€™s dairy producers demand a consultant-based veterinary service which contrasts greatly with the veterinary service of the past. Offering nutrition services is also a great way for young veterinarians to become good at troubleshooting feed-related disease processes on dairy farms.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2019; 172-173
